verbs.description: [ARG0: North Korea] [V: invited] [ARG1: foreign journalists] [ARG2: to witness the destruction of a nuclear testing facility just hours before President Donald Trump canceled the planned summit in Singapore with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on Thursday morning] .
